Description: Ostracon (?), fragment of the upper-body of a red pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and partially grey in section, both the interior and the exterior are thinly covered with a rough brown slip, traces of one line of incised Coptic text survive on the exterior.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394842) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394842)
